name: Meter
description:
Have you ever wondered why your parking meter looks at you funny?

Well, it's probably because it's infested with gremlin-hackers that try to steal your personal data!

Help gremlins take over the world by hacking - Hollywood action movie style!

Mash buttons on your keyboard as fast as you can, but be careful - when firewall scans the meter, make sure not to press anything! 3 fails and you're out, buddy!
